com.metreeca.rest

Class Response

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.Message<Response>
      • com.metreeca.rest.Response

  • public final class Response
extends Message<Response>
    HTTP response.

    Handles state/behaviour for HTTP responses.

        Creates a new response for a request.

    • Method Detail

      • item

        public String item()
        Retrieves the focus item IRI of this response.
        Specified by:
        item in class Message<Response>
        Returns:
        the absolute IRI included in the Location header of this response, if defined; the focus item IRI of the originating request otherwise

      • request

        public Request request()
        Retrieves the originating request for this response.
        Specified by:
        request in class Message<Response>
        Returns:
        the originating request for this response

      • success

        public boolean success()
        Checks if this response is successful.
        Returns:
        true if the status code is in the 2XX range; false otherwise

      • error

        public boolean error()
        Checks if this response is an error.
        Returns:
        true if the status code is in beyond the 3XX range; false otherwise

      • status

        public int status()
        Retrieves the status code of this response.
        Returns:
        the status code of this response

      • status

        public Response status(int status)
        Configures the status code of this response.
        Parameters:
        status - the status code of this response
        Returns:
        this response
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if response is less than 100 or greater than 599

      • cause

        public Optional<Throwable> cause()
        Retrieves the cause for the status code.
        Returns:
        a optional throwable causing the selection of the status code

      • cause

        public Response cause(Throwable cause)
        Configures the cause for the status code.
        Parameters:
        cause - the (possibly null) throwable causing the selection of the status code
        Returns:
        this response
